caption.p: (A) Mice were infected i.n. with H3N2 virus. Gating strategy to analyze total lung cDCs (Siglec-F-CD11c+MHCII+CD64-) and cDC subsets (CD172α+CD24+ and CD172α-CD24++) at day 0 (left panel) and 4dpi (right panel) is shown. (B) Gating strategy to analyze BM MDPs (Lin-CD117+CD135+CD115+), CDPs (Lin-CD117lowCD135+CD11c-CD115+) and pre-DCs (Lin-CD11c+MHCII-CD135+) is shown.
Click here for additional data file.
